Selected Answer: CD
page 372 and 380 of study guide

choices.C: The guest portal provides pre and post-log in services.
choices.A: Each remote user on FortiAuthenticator can sponsor up to 10 guest accounts.
choices.B: Administrators must approve all guest accounts before they can be used.
choices.D: Administrators can use one or more incoming parameters to configure a mapping rule for the guest portal.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about the guest portal on FortiAuthenticator are true? (Choose two.)
